courses.title: Python Programming Bootcamp
courses.description: Master Python from basics to advanced concepts. Includes hands-on projects, quizzes, and real-world applications.
whatYouLearn: Understand data types, loops, and control flow

detailedChapters.title: Introduction to Python
detailedChapters.content: History and features of Python, installation, and setup.

detailedChapters.title: Variables and Data Types
detailedChapters.content: Numbers, strings, lists, tuples, and dictionaries.

detailedChapters.title: Control Flow
detailedChapters.content: If statements, loops, and logical operators.

detailedChapters.title: Functions and Modules
detailedChapters.content: Defining and using functions, importing modules.

detailedChapters.title: File Handling
detailedChapters.content: Reading from and writing to files.

detailedChapters.title: Virtual Environments
detailedChapters.content: Managing dependencies with venv and pip.

detailedChapters.title: Final Quiz & Wrap-up
detailedChapters.content: Test your knowledge and next steps.

faqs.question: Do I need prior programming experience?
faqs.answer: No, this course is suitable for absolute beginners.

faqs.question: Are there hands-on projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, every module includes practical exercises.

courses.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of AI, including search algorithms, logic, and knowledge representation. No prior experience required.
whatYouLearn: Understand what AI is and its history
Learn about search algorithms and problem solving

detailedChapters.title: What is AI?
detailedChapters.content: Definition, history, and branches of AI.

detailedChapters.title: AI Applications
detailedChapters.content: AI in healthcare, finance, and more.

faqs.question: Is this course technical?
faqs.answer: No, it's designed for beginners and non-programmers.

courses.title: Machine Learning A-Z
courses.description: Comprehensive guide to Machine Learning using Python and R. Includes supervised and unsupervised learning, and practical exercises.
whatYouLearn: Build supervised and unsupervised ML models

detailedChapters.title: Introduction to ML
detailedChapters.content: What is machine learning and its types.

detailedChapters.title: Classification
detailedChapters.content: Logistic regression, KNN, SVM, Decision Trees.

detailedChapters.title: Project 1: House Price Prediction
detailedChapters.content: Apply regression to predict house prices.

faqs.question: Do I need Python or R knowledge?
faqs.answer: Basic familiarity helps, but all code is explained.

courses.title: Deep Learning with TensorFlow
courses.description: Learn to build neural networks and deep learning models with TensorFlow. Covers CNNs, RNNs, and practical projects.
whatYouLearn: Use CNNs for image tasks and RNNs for sequences
Train and tune deep learning models

detailedChapters.title: Intro to Deep Learning
detailedChapters.content: Neural networks and deep learning basics.

detailedChapters.title: Recurrent Neural Networks
detailedChapters.content: Sequence modeling with RNNs and LSTMs.

faqs.question: Is prior ML knowledge required?
faqs.answer: Yes, you should know basic ML concepts.

courses.title: Data Science with Python
courses.description: Analyze data, visualize results, and make data-driven decisions using Python libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.
whatYouLearn: Analyze data with Pandas and NumPy

detailedChapters.title: Project: Titanic Survival
detailedChapters.content: Predict survival on the Titanic dataset.

faqs.question: Is this course project-based?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll work on real datasets and projects.

courses.title: Natural Language Processing in Python
courses.description: Dive into NLP with Python. Learn text processing, sentiment analysis, and build chatbots using NLTK and spaCy.
whatYouLearn: Create chatbots using NLTK and spaCy

detailedChapters.title: NLP Basics
detailedChapters.content: What is NLP and its applications.

faqs.question: Do I need prior ML knowledge?
faqs.answer: Some ML basics are helpful but not required.

courses.title: Reinforcement Learning Essentials
courses.description: Understand the basics of reinforcement learning and build your own agents to solve real-world problems.
whatYouLearn: Apply RL to games and robotics

detailedChapters.title: RL Foundations
detailedChapters.content: Explore states, actions, rewards, and policies.

detailedChapters.title: Project: Game Agent
detailedChapters.content: Build an agent to play a simple game.

faqs.question: Is math required?
faqs.answer: A basic understanding of probability and calculus is helpful.

courses.title: Computer Vision with OpenCV
courses.description: Learn to process and analyze images and videos using OpenCV and Python. Includes object detection and face recognition projects.
whatYouLearn: Work with images and videos in Python

detailedChapters.title: Image Basics
detailedChapters.content: Read and process images with OpenCV.

detailedChapters.title: Object Detection
detailedChapters.content: Detect objects in images and video.

faqs.question: Do I need a GPU?
faqs.answer: A GPU is helpful but not required for most projects.

courses.title: Python for Data Analysis
courses.description: Get hands-on with data analysis using Python. Work with real datasets and learn data cleaning, transformation, and visualization.
whatYouLearn: Import and clean data in Python

detailedChapters.title: Data Import
detailedChapters.content: Read data from CSV, Excel, and databases.

detailedChapters.title: Project: Sales Data Analysis
detailedChapters.content: Analyze sales data from a retail store.

faqs.question: Is this course project-based?
faqs.answer: Yes, you'll work on real datasets and projects.

courses.title: Advanced Machine Learning Projects
courses.description: Build real-world ML projects using advanced techniques including ensemble methods, feature engineering, and model deployment.
whatYouLearn: Build advanced ML projects from scratch
Apply ensemble methods and feature engineering

detailedChapters.title: Model Deployment
detailedChapters.content: Deploy models with Flask and Docker.

faqs.question: Are these real-world projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, all projects are based on real datasets.

courses.title: AI for Everyone
courses.description: A non-technical introduction to AI concepts, trends, and applications. Perfect for business professionals and beginners.
whatYouLearn: Understand what AI is and what it can (and can’t) do
Identify opportunities to apply AI in your own organization
Navigate ethical and societal challenges of AI
Communicate effectively about AI with technical teams

detailedChapters.title: AI Fundamentals
detailedChapters.content: Learn what AI is, its history, and its core concepts.

detailedChapters.title: AI in Business
detailedChapters.content: Explore how AI is transforming industries and organizations.

detailedChapters.title: Ethics and Society
detailedChapters.content: Discuss the ethical implications and societal impact of AI.

detailedChapters.title: Communicating AI
detailedChapters.content: Learn how to talk about AI with technical and non-technical audiences.

detailedChapters.title: Final Quiz
detailedChapters.content: Test your understanding of AI concepts.

faqs.question: Is this course technical?
faqs.answer: No, it’s designed for non-technical learners and business professionals.

courses.title: PyTorch for Deep Learning
courses.description: Master deep learning with PyTorch. Build neural networks, GANs, and deploy models with hands-on projects.
whatYouLearn: Train and deploy deep learning models

detailedChapters.title: GANs
detailedChapters.content: Build and train generative adversarial networks.

detailedChapters.title: Project: Image Generator
detailedChapters.content: Build a GAN for image generation.

faqs.question: Is prior deep learning experience required?
faqs.answer: Yes, you should know basic neural networks.

courses.title: Time Series Analysis with Python
courses.description: Analyze and forecast time series data using Python. Covers ARIMA, Prophet, and deep learning approaches.
whatYouLearn: Apply time series to real data

detailedChapters.title: Project: Stock Price Prediction
detailedChapters.content: Predict stock prices with time series models.

faqs.question: Is Python required?
faqs.answer: Yes, basic Python knowledge is needed.

courses.title: Data Visualization with Matplotlib & Seaborn
courses.description: Create stunning data visualizations in Python using Matplotlib and Seaborn. Includes interactive charts and dashboards.
whatYouLearn: Create line, bar, and scatter plots

detailedChapters.title: Project: Sales Dashboard
detailedChapters.content: Create a dashboard for sales data.

faqs.question: Do I need design skills?
faqs.answer: No, you'll learn all you need in the course.

courses.title: Building Recommendation Systems
courses.description: Learn to create personalized recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, and hybrid methods.

faqs.question: Do I need ML experience?
faqs.answer: Some ML basics are helpful but not required.

courses.title: Python for Web Development
courses.description: Build dynamic web applications using Python, Flask, and Django. Includes REST APIs and deployment.
whatYouLearn: Build web apps with Flask and Django

detailedChapters.title: Flask
detailedChapters.content: Build a simple web app with Flask.

detailedChapters.title: Django
detailedChapters.content: Create a full-featured site with Django.

detailedChapters.title: Templates
detailedChapters.content: Dynamic HTML with Jinja and Django templates.

detailedChapters.title: Testing
detailedChapters.content: Write tests for your web app.

detailedChapters.title: Deployment
detailedChapters.content: Deploy your app to the cloud.

detailedChapters.title: Final Project
detailedChapters.content: Build and deploy a complete web app.

faqs.question: Do I need HTML/CSS?
faqs.answer: Basic HTML/CSS knowledge is helpful but not required.

courses.title: Ethics in AI and Data Science
courses.description: Explore the ethical considerations in AI and data science, including bias, fairness, and responsible AI practices.

detailedChapters.title: AI Bias
detailedChapters.content: What is bias and how does it arise in AI?

detailedChapters.title: Responsible AI
detailedChapters.content: Guidelines and frameworks for ethical AI.

detailedChapters.title: Final Assessment
detailedChapters.content: Test your understanding of AI ethics.

faqs.question: Is this course technical?
faqs.answer: No, it's suitable for all backgrounds.

courses.title: Image Processing with Python
courses.description: Learn fundamental and advanced image processing techniques with Python and PIL, OpenCV, and Scikit-Image.

detailedChapters.title: Image Basics
detailedChapters.content: Read and process images with PIL and OpenCV.

faqs.question: Do I need a GPU?
faqs.answer: A GPU is helpful but not required.

courses.title: Speech Recognition with Deep Learning
courses.description: Build speech recognition systems using deep learning. Covers audio preprocessing, feature extraction, and model training.
whatYouLearn: Build deep learning models for speech recognition

detailedChapters.title: Deep Learning Models
detailedChapters.content: Build RNN and CNN models for speech.

faqs.question: Do I need audio hardware?
faqs.answer: No, sample audio files are provided.

courses.title: Automating Tasks with Python
courses.description: Automate boring tasks like file handling, web scraping, and emailing using Python scripts. Perfect for boosting productivity.
whatYouLearn: Automate file operations and folder management

detailedChapters.title: Python Automation Basics
detailedChapters.content: What is automation and where to use it.

detailedChapters.title: File and Folder Automation
detailedChapters.content: Move, copy, and rename files with Python.

detailedChapters.title: Web Scraping
detailedChapters.content: Extract data from websites with BeautifulSoup.

detailedChapters.title: Project: Bulk File Organizer
detailedChapters.content: Organize files in your computer automatically.

faqs.question: Do I need admin rights?
faqs.answer: No, all scripts run in user mode.
